app.name: Slim Market
layout.footer.demo_note: Identity demo · Built with Slim Framework
front.home.heading: Launch listings for your devices
front.home.intro: Create your account, upload ads for phones or gadgets, publish, and reach people who are ready to purchase.
front.home.status.signed_in: Signed in as %email%. Your profile is ready to manage listings.
front.home.status.signed_out: Create an account to publish your first listing.
front.home.status.stat_protected: Payments and publishing are gated so only verified ads are promoted.
front.home.features.title: Marketplace toolkit
front.home.features.subtitle: Everything you need to launch a listing
front.home.features.profile.title: Complete account profiles
front.home.features.profile.description: Add your avatar, contact details, and bio so shoppers trust your listings.
front.home.features.gallery.title: Upload-ready ad cards
front.home.features.gallery.description: Attach photos, specs, and highlights for phones, tablets, and accessories.
front.home.features.payments.title: Pay to publish
front.home.features.payments.description: Secure checkout unlocks your listing so it goes live.
front.home.features.trust.title: Trust signals
front.home.features.trust.description: Status chips show when an ad is published, pending payment, or in draft.
front.home.listings.title: Featured device listings
front.home.listings.description: Preview how your ads look once they are approved and visible to shoppers.
front.home.listings.items.iphone.title: iPhone 14 Pro Max 256GB
front.home.listings.items.iphone.summary: Boxed with MagSafe case and warranty for 10 months.
front.home.listings.items.pixel.title: Pixel 8 Pro 128GB
front.home.listings.items.pixel.summary: Clean device with night-sight camera kit and original charger.
front.home.listings.items.galaxy.title: Galaxy S23 FE
front.home.listings.items.galaxy.summary: Factory sealed with fast shipping and flexible pickup.
front.home.steps.title: How selling works
front.home.steps.subtitle: From registration to live ads
front.home.steps.account.title: Create your account
front.home.steps.account.description: Register to unlock your profile and secure checkout.
front.home.steps.profile.title: Set up your profile
front.home.steps.profile.description: Add a bio, avatar, and contact information shoppers can trust.
front.home.steps.listing.title: Upload your device
front.home.steps.listing.description: Add photos, specs, and pricing for each phone or gadget.
front.home.steps.payment.title: Pay to publish
front.home.steps.payment.description: Complete payment so your ad is verified and promoted.
front.home.steps.go_live.title: Reach shoppers
front.home.steps.go_live.description: Approved ads go live instantly for shoppers to contact you.
front.home.profile.title: Profile controls
front.home.profile.description: Manage listings and messages in one place.
front.home.cta.title: Ready to list your first device?
front.home.cta.description: Publish your phone, tablet, or laptop in just a few steps.
front.api.greeting: Hi from the public API endpoint!
errors.not_found.title: Page not found
errors.not_found.description: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.
admin.dashboard.heading: Administration dashboard
admin.dashboard.intro: Only administrators can access these RBAC tools. Use them to manage accounts and permissions.
admin.dashboard.session.title: Your session
admin.dashboard.permissions.manage_users: You can manage other user accounts from this dashboard.
admin.dashboard.permissions.read_only: You currently have read-only access to the admin dashboard.
admin.dashboard.next_steps.title: Next steps
admin.dashboard.next_steps.description: Extend the scaffold with your own persistence and token issuance.
admin.dashboard.next_steps.users: Create additional users from the %register% form.
admin.dashboard.next_steps.database: Wire this scaffold to a real database when you are ready.
admin.dashboard.quick_actions.title: Quick actions
admin.dashboard.quick_actions.descriptio: Jump to the most common administration pages.
admin.dashboard.react.hero.title: Launch smarter ads that reach buyers right when they are ready.
admin.dashboard.react.hero.lead: Slim Ads keeps your listings, promo campaigns, and analytics in one place—optimized for speed, clarity, and measurable conversions.
admin.dashboard.react.today.title: Today at a glance
admin.dashboard.react.feature.title: Built for high-performing ads
admin.dashboard.react.feature.descriptio: Everything you need to launch, optimize, and scale listings for any marketplace category.
admin.dashboard.react.feature.cards.targ: Use interest, location, and behavior signals to reach the right buyers without guesswork.
admin.dashboard.react.feature.cards.stud: Start from ready-made ad layouts, auto-resize assets, and keep brand colors consistent.
admin.dashboard.react.feature.cards.perf: Track clicks, calls, and saves live with alerts that keep your team in the loop.
admin.dashboard.react.feature.cards.budg: Set daily caps, guard against overspend, and pause campaigns instantly from mobile.
admin.dashboard.react.categories.title: Popular ad categories
admin.dashboard.react.categories.descrip: Jump-start new listings using category templates that already perform well on Slim Ads.
admin.dashboard.react.quick_actions.item: Launch a product or service ad in under 5 minutes.
Combine ads across channels for a seasonal push.
Share roles and approvals with agency or sales teams.
